name: Apple of My Basket
description: Apple of My Basket is a game where you control a basket with your finger and catch red apples and avoid catching green apples. Missing a red apple also makes you lose. In this game, the longer you can catch the correct apples, the higher your score will be. Your score is based on the amount of time you collect the correct apples. (In seconds) See how long you can keep collecting the exact apples. Good Luck!
